text:
Prof Giunti and Suzanne Booth in collaboration with #AtaxiaUK have written an information leaflet for people affected by #ataxia about the #Covid19 #vaccine, which has recently been updated. 

Read it here: https://t.co/GWHA8LAi8W

@AtaxiaCentreUCL 

#AtaxiaAwareness #Coronavirus https://t.co/uX6dJw9LxW
